Title: Chyornaya roza - emblema pechali, krasnaya roza - emblema lyubvi
Actors: Tatyana Drubich, Aleksandr Abdulov, Mikhail Rozanov
Plot: In fact, people who then appear around Mitya are all unique, eccentric and the space of the apartment house begins to have an unrealistic character as a miniature of unstable society in the end of Soviet Union.
